Comment: When reached for comment, Abel’s father was outraged that the killer was profiting from his son’s death. “Where is the justice in this?” Adam asked. “Are there actually people who are feeling bad for the man who killed my son? Who is donating to this fund anyway?”  Adam is correct!
Author: Sure-Wishbone-4293

Comment: If a crowdfunding was setup for cain, then probably all the people in the entire world would have contributed to it. All... at least two, maybe a handful of people   Would be a bit hard to find a jury of his peers if all of them are unfit for having donated to the fund
Author: Dutchtdk

Comment: A fool and his money are easily parted
Author: MacadamiaMinded

Comment: "Who could have donated to the fund"   Asks adam as he looks at eve, cain, and a corpse and no other human in the entire rest of the world
